DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not there have been any changes in medications in the previous 8 weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pharmacologic Substance Prior 8 Weeks Change Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro.._Earlier in time or order._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::8_Any period of seven consecutive days._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic substance including endogenous body substance used to diagnose, prevent, maintain, treat or analyze abnormal and normal biological functions in vivo or in vitro.

Concepts.definition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::8:Any period of seven consecutive days.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
